lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It said it is now offering a Starlan network, which was originally introduced by American telephone and Telegraph Co <t>, a thin Ethernet and a PC interface for the standard Ethernet.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Data General is the first vendor to offer three different local area networks for personal computer integration," said Colin Crook, senior vice president of the company's communications systems group.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Data General Corp said it introduced several new hardware and software products that link International Business Machines Corp <IBM> and IBM-compatible personal computers into mainframe and minicomputer systems.

lst.name: sentence
